imdb.plot outline: 30 min late night show on Nova TV - the leading TV channel in Bulgaria. Original, innovative and provocative political and entertainment talk show format with animated host and live guests - Bulgarian politics, movie stars, athletes and famous singers. The late night show Host - Mark O'selski - is the first virtual host in Bulgaria.
imdb.title: Stubbornly
